thread.title: Injuries: Nick Mangold will have X-rays on neck - NFL.com
thread.title_full: Injuries: Nick Mangold will have X-rays on neck - NFL.com

title: Injuries: Nick Mangold will have X-rays on neck - NFL.com
text:
More Columns > 
The Jets may have suffered a big blow in addition to the loss to the AFC East leading Patriots . 
Center Nick Mangold suffered a neck injury late in the game and walked off the field. Todd Bowles said he will have an X-Ray. 
Here's the rest of Sunday's injury news: Every game, all season
1. Texans RB Arian Foster tore his Achilles late in the game against the Dolphins , according to NFL Media Insider Ian Rapoport, per a source informed of the injury. 
2. Lions signal-caller Matthew Stafford suffered a left hand injury against the Vikings . Coach Jim Caldwell said after the game that Stafford will have X-rays. 
3. Vincent Jackson suffered a knee injury for Tampa Bay and didn't return. The Buccaneers also lost receiver Louis Murphy for the rest of the game against the Redskins after suffering a knee injury following a big catch early in the first half. The Bucs only had four wideouts active. 
4. Ryan Kerrigan suffered a hand injury and did not return. Fellow linebacker Mason Foster also did not return with a hamstring injury. 
5. Falcons wideout Leonard Hankerson suffered a hamstring injury and didn't return. Safety William Moore also didn't return after suffering a groin injury for Atlanta. 
6. Chargers tight end Antonio Gates (knee) is inactive against the Raiders but running back Melvin Gordon suited up for San Diego. 
7. Titans center Andy Gallik has a stinger and did not return. 
8. Titans tight end Phillip Supernaw suffered a chest injury and did not return. 
9. Titans cornerback Jason McCourty has a hamstring injury and is did not return. After the game, he said his hamstring was sore and that he didn't think it was too bad. 
10. Colts wideout Phillip Dorsett injured his ankle on Sunday and never return. 
11. Jets safety Calvin Pryor suffered an ankle injury and did not return. 
12. Browns wideout Andrew Hawkins suffered a head injury and didn't return. 
13. Josh McCown suffered a shoulder injury and Johnny Manziel came in at quarterback. McCown didn't return. 
14. William Gay suffered a shoulder injury for the Steelers and did not return. 
15. Running back Joseph Randle is on the sideline for the Cowboys . He has a back strain and his return is probable.
